hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT DISTINCT EOTO.EOTO_CODE, EOTO.EOTO_NAME, EOEU.EOEU_EOTO_CODE, EOEU.EOEU_DEFAULT FROM EO_EORE_2_ESPU EOEU LEFT JOIN EO_TEMPLATE_ORDER EOTO ON EOTO.EOTO_CODE = EOEU.EOEU_EOTO_CODE AND EOTO.ORG_ID = EOEU.ORG_ID LEFT JOIN ES_USER ESUS ON EOEU.EOEU_ESUS_ID = ESUS.ESUS_ID AND EOEU.ORG_ID = ESUS.ESUS_ESCO_ID WHERE 1=1 AND EOTO.REC_STATUS=0 <<AND EOEU.EOEU_EOTO_CODE LIKE '%' || :eotoCode || '%' >> <<AND EOEU.ORG_ID=:orgId>> <<AND EOEU.EOEU_DEFAULT LIKE '%' || :eoeuDefault || '%' >> <<AND ESUS.ESUS_LOGIN_NAME LIKE '%' || :esusLoginName || '%' >>
